highlights.description: Add Releases page with ReleaseLogViewer and Resources dropdown navigation

added.description: Releases page using `@grokify/releaselog` viewer from unpkg CDN
Resources dropdown menu consolidating Blog, Releases, Philosophy, and RSS

changed.description: Navigation reduced from 8 top-level items to 5 with Resources dropdown
Mobile menu updated with Resources section header

fixed.description: GitHub Actions artifact path corrected from `dist` to `docs`

highlights.description: Initial release of AgentPlexus website with projects, integrations, blog, and MCP pages

added.description: React-based website with Tailwind CSS and dark theme
Homepage with hero, products, philosophy, and getting started sections
Integrations page with categorized integration cards
Blog with Markdown support and Atom feed
GitHub Pages deployment with SPA routing via 404.html
